name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Physical damage is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Gun damage is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Fire damage is increased by 20%.

desc: Party's Ice damage is increased by 20%.

desc: Party's Almighty damage is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's <color=#FFFC40>critical damage</color> is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: <color=#FFFC40>Assassin</color> allies' damage is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: <color=#FFFC40>Sweeper</color> allies' damage is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: <color=#FFFC40>Medic</color> allies' damage is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: <color=#FFFC40>Guardian</color> allies' damage is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: <color=#FFFC40>Strategist</color> allies' damage is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: <color=#FFFC40>Saboteur</color> allies' damage is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes inflicted with Burn take 20% increased damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes inflicted with Freeze take 20% increased damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes inflicted with Shock take 20% increased damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes inflicted with Windswept take 20% increased damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes inflicted with Elemental Ailments take 20% increased damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Physical affinity changes to Weak.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Gun affinity changes to Weak.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Fire affinity changes to Weak.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Ice affinity changes to Weak.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Electric affinity changes to Weak.

desc: All foes' Wind affinity changes to Weak.

desc: All foes' Psychokinesis affinity changes to Weak.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Nuclear affinity changes to Weak.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Bless affinity changes to Weak.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' Curse affinity changes to Weak.

name: Special Effect
desc: Allies granted with Blessing deal 25% increased damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: <color=#FF423F>Shielded</color> allies deal 20% increased damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's <color=#FFFC40>Highlight</color> damage is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: <color=#FFFC40>Wonder</color>'s <color=#FFFC40>final damage</color> is increased by 50%. Other allies' final damage is decreased by 80%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Allies are unable to deal critical hits, but deal increased <color=#FFFC40>final damage</color> from skills and Resonances. This increase is equal to critical hit rate x (critical damage - 100%). (Max critical hit rate in this calculation is 100%).

name: Special Effect
desc: <color=#FFFC40>Wonder</color>'s <color=#FFFC40>final damage</color> is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Other allies' final damage is decreased by 80%.

name: Special Effect
desc: If the party contains Guardians or Medics, all foes' final damage dealt is decreased by 60% and final damage taken is increased by 20%. If not, all foes' final damage dealt is increased by 60%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Physical damage is decreased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Gun damage is decreased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Fire damage is decreased by 20%.

desc: All foes' Physical affinity changes to Resist.

name: Make Ready!
desc: When party uses ranged attacks, damage increases by 10%.

name: Load!
desc: When party runs out of ammo, fully reload after 2 turns.

name: Aim!
desc: When party uses ranged attacks, Gun damage increases by 10%.

name: Fire at Will!
desc: When party uses ranged attacks, Gun damage increases by an additional 10%.

name: Light 'em up!
desc: When party runs out of ammo, fully reload after 1 turn.

name: Special Effect
desc:
At the start of battle, all allies gain 2 Seal of Power stacks. Gain 1 stack when inflicting weakness damage on foes. Lose 1 stack automatically at the end of each turn.
Seal of Power: Final damage increases by 15% per stack. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.
Also gain effects from Stable Domain during battle.
Stable Domain: Allies cannot deal critical hits. Final damage is based on critical rate and critical damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: When a skill is used or Resonance is activated, gain 1 Seal of Power stack. After all ally actions, increase final damage by 15% for each Seal of Power stack, and then lose 1 stack. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Special Effect
desc:
At the start of each turn, gain 1 Seal of Power for each max HP increase. Gain 1 Seal of Power stack when dealing damage with a Resonance.
Seal of Power: Increase final damage by 10% for each stack. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Special Effect
desc:
When dealing damage with a Resonance, inflict Magnetic Interference on the target.
Magnetic Interference: Increase damage taken by 40% for 2 turns. Stacks up to 1 time.

name: Special Effect
desc: When a Strategist uses a buff skill, all allies gain Yang Energy. When a Saboteur uses a debuff skill, all allies gain Yin Energy.

name: Special Effect
desc: After all allies act, all foes will be inflicted with an elemental ailment and their damage taken is increased by 10%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Elucidator's stat buff effects are increased by 30% and weakness damage is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc:
When an ally activates a Highlight, all allies gain 1 Mark of Augmentation.
Mark of Augmentation: Increases Attack by 30%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: When an ally spends HP to use a skill, they gain 4 Blood's Grace stacks. When allies activate a Highlight, all allies gain 2 Blood's Grace stacks. 1 Blood's Grace stack is lost at the end of each turn.

name: Special Effect
desc:
When healing an ally with a Resonance, grant all allies 2 Mental Link stacks. When receiving a max HP up effect, grant the target 4 Mental Link stacks.
Mental Link: Increase Attack by 10% for each stack. This effect lasts for 2 turns and can stack up to 8 times.

name: Special Effect
desc:
When an ally deals damage with Resonance, they gain Wild Fury.
Wild Fury: Final damage increases by 20%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.

name: Special Effect
desc:
When an ally spends HP to use a skill, they gain 1 Bloodbath Blessing stack.
Bloodbath Blessing: Final damage increases by 40%.

name: Special Effect
desc:
Elucidator's stat buff effects are increased by 30%. When an ally deals weakness damage, they gain Tremor Amplification.
Tremor Amplification: Final damage increases by 40%. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Special Effect
desc:
When an ally gains a shield, they also gain Charge Field. An ally can also gain Charge Field when they deal weakness damage.
Charge Field: Final damage increases by 5%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 8 times.

name: Special Effect
desc:
When allies deal weakness damage, they gain 4 Charge Field stacks. When allies gain a shield, they gain 1 Charge Field stack.
Charge Field: Increase final damage by 5%. Lasts for 1 turn. Stacks up to 8 times.

name: Special Effect
desc:
At the start of battle, all allies gain 2 Magnetic Force stacks. They gain 1 stack after dealing weakness damage.
Magnetic Force: Increase final damage by 20% per stack. Lose 1 stack at the end of each turn. Stacks up to 2 times.

name: Special Effect
desc:
After dealing damage with skills or Resonance, gain 1 Impact stack.
Impact: Deal 5% final damage for each stack. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 8 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes' damage taken is increased by 6% for each <color=#FFFC40>debuff</color> they are inflicted with, up to 30%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes' damage taken is increased by 50% once. Afterwards, damage taken is decreased by 50%. Stacks up to 2 times. Resets after 2 turns.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes' damage taken is decreased by 50% once. Afterwards, damage taken is increased by 20%. Stacks up to 4 times. Resets after 2 turns.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's <color=#FFFC40>Resonance</color> damage is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc:
After the boss takes an action, all allies are inflicted with <color=#FFFC40>Intimidation</color>. When Intimidation is removed, all foes are inflicted with Intimidation.
Intimidation: Defense decreases by 10%, up to 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes' damage taken is increased by 10% for each <color=#FFFC40>elemental ailment</color> they have, up to 40%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Whenever an ally deals damage, that ally's damage is increased by 1%. Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 80 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: The boss' affinities change, and the party's <color=#FFFC40>weakness damage</color> is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When any ally receives <color=#FFFC40>healing</color>, their final damage is increased by 8%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 4 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: When any ally receives <color=#FFFC40>healing from a Resonance</color>, their final damage is increased by 8%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: Whenever an ally deals damage, that ally's damage is increased by 4%. Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 10 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes' damage taken is increased by 3% for each <color=#FFFC40>debuff</color> they have, up to 45%.

name: Special Effect
desc: After all allies gain a <color=#FFFC40>shield</color>, their final <color=#FFFC40>Resonance</color> damage is increased by 8%. Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 8 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: All allies' final damage is increased based on their ailment accuracy. Final damage is increased by a maximum of 15% at 150% ailment accuracy.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's <color=#FFFC40>Resonance</color> critical damage is increased by 25% and Attack by 25%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When allies are on an <color=#FFFC40>extra action</color>, critical rate is increased by 20%, and critical damage is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc:
Dominion continuously summons waves of Angels. You can restore SP when you defeat an Angel.
When Dominion is Weakened, damage dealt to summoned Angels will be added to your score.

name: Special Effect
desc:
Dominion continuously summons waves of Angels. You can restore SP when you defeat an Angel.
When you deal damage to a summoned Angel, your score increases.

name: Special Effect
desc:
After the boss deals damage, the target is inflicted with 1 <color=#FFFC40>Wicked Poison</color> stack.
Wicked Poison: Lose a certain amount of HP at the end of each turn and increase final damage taken by 10%. Stacks up to 7 times. Can be removed.

name: Special Effect
desc:
At the end of each turn, foes gain 1 <color=#FFFC40>Berserk</color> stack.
Berserk: Increase final damage by 15%. Can be stacked.

name: Special Effect
desc: <color=#FF423F>Shielded</color> allies' final damage taken is decreased by 40%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When any ally receives <color=#FFFC40>healing</color>, their final damage taken is decreased by 12%. Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 4 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' damage taken from All-Out Attacks is increased by 100%.

name: Special Effect
desc: After a foe takes damage, the party's damage is increased by 5%, up to 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When a foe is defeated, the party's damage is increased by 25%, up to 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: At the start of battle, party's HP is decreased by 50%. Party's healing and shield effects are increased by 20%. After an ally receives healing or a shield, their damage is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Fire damage is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Ice damage is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Electric damage is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Wind damage is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Psychokinesis damage is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Nuclear damage is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Bless damage is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Curse damage is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's <color=#FF423F>Resonance</color> damage is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's <color=#FF423F>Highlight</color> damage is increased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Elucidator's <color=#FFFC40>stat buff</color> effects are increased by 25%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Physical/Gun damage is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Fire/Psy damage is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Ice/Nuclear damage is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Electric/Bless damage is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Party's Wind/Curse damage is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: <color=#FFFC40>Assassin</color> allies' final damage is increased by 30%. Other allies' final damage is decreased by 30%.

name: Special Effect
desc: <color=#FFFC40>Sweeper</color> allies' final damage is increased by 30%. Other allies' final damage is decreased by 30%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Fire/Ice/Electric/Wind allies' final damage is increased by 30%. Other allies' final damage is decreased by 30%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Psychokinesis/Nuclear/Bless/Curse allies' final damage is increased by 30%. Other allies' final damage is decreased by 30%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Physical/Gun/Almighty allies' final damage is increased by 30%. Other allies' final damage is decreased by 30%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' final damage taken is increased by 5% for each <color=#FFFC40>elemental ailment</color> inflicted. If a foe has 4 types of <color=#FFFC40>elemental ailments</color> at once, their final damage taken is increased by 40% more.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes will be inflicted with most <color=#FFFC40>spiritual ailments</color>. When an ally inflicts a <color=#FFFC40>spiritual ailment</color>, their ailment accuracy is greatly increased. Foes inflicted with <color=#FFFC40>spiritual ailments</color> take increased final damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: When all allies are inflicted with a <color=#FFFC40>spiritual ailment</color>, ailment accuracy is greatly increased.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes' spiritual ailment resistance is increased, but their final damage taken is increased by 60% when inflicted with a <color=#FFFC40>spiritual ailment</color>.

name: Special Effect
desc: When the party activates a <color=#FFFC40>Resonance</color>, their final damage is increased by 100%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When the party activates a <color=#FFFC40>continuous damage</color> effect, their final damage is increased by 200%.

name: Special Effect
desc: The Highlight gauge fills 20% slower, but Highlight final damage is increased by 200%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When the party gains a <color=#FFFC40>shield</color>, their final damage is increased by 8%. Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 8 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: When the party receives <color=#FFFC40>healing from a Resonance</color>, their final damage is increased by 30%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: When the party gets an <color=#FFFC40>extra action</color>, their final damage is increased by 120%.

name: Special Effect
desc: At the start of battle and at the start of the foe's action, 1 of the foes' affinities randomly changes to Weak (only the most recently gained Weak affinity will remain). When a foe takes damage from a 1 More or All-Out Attack, their damage taken is increased by 400%.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' max HP is decreased by 50%. At the end of each turn, all foes' HP is restored by 10% of their max HP.

name: Special Effect
desc: All foes' final damage taken is increased based on their current missing HP. Final damage taken is increased up to a maximum of 40% when below 20% HP.

name: Special Effect
desc:
At the start of battle and after every 5 turns, all allies and enemies take a certain amount of damage and gain 1 stack of <color=#FFFC40>Power of Passion</color>.
Power of Passion: Increase damage taken by 5%. Stacks up to 15 times. Can be removed.

name: Special Effect
desc:
When an ally deals damage with a skill, they gain 1 Attribute Seal. When the total number of Attribute Seals reaches 7, spend all Attribute Seals and activate Starfall.
Starfall: Deal 7 hits of Almighty damage to random foes. Decrease damage for multiple hits on the same foe.

name: Special Effect
desc:
<nobr>When an ally uses a <color=#FFFC40>Highlight</color>, gain 1 Blazing Starfire stack. When Blazing Starfire reaches 4 stacks, spend all Blazing Starfire and activate Sparkling Stage.
Sparkling Stage: Randomly grants 10 buffs to allies. The following buffs may each be granted to 1 random ally.
Increase Attack by 15%.
Increase Defense by 22.5%.
Increase max HP by 15%.
Increase damage by 12%.
Increase ailment accuracy by 18%.
Increase pierce rate by 6%.
Increase critical rate by 9%.
Increase critical damage by 18%.
Increase pierce resistance by 7.5%.
Increase weakness damage by 6%.

name: Node Breaker
desc: <color=#FF423F>Node Breaker</color>: <color=#fffc40>Combat Chip</color>. When an ally defeats a foe, gain <color=#fffc40>10</color> deployment points. Allies' damage is increased by <color=#fffc40>30%</color>.

name: Vulnerability Cracking
desc: <color=#FF423F>Vulnerability Cracking</color>: <color=#fffc40>Combat Chip</color>. When an ally deals weakness damage, gain <color=#fffc40>3</color> deployment points. Allies' weakness damage is increased by <color=#fffc40>37.5%</color>.

name: Synchro-attack
desc: <color=#FF423F>Synchro-attack</color>: <color=#fffc40>Combat Chip</color>. When allies take damage of their own attribute, gain <color=#fffc40>4</color> deployment points. Damage is increased by <color=#fffc40>60%</color>.

name: Flooding Device
desc: <color=#FF423F>Flooding Device</color>: <color=#fffc40>Combat Chip</color>. Each time allies attack, gain <color=#fffc40>1</color> deployment point. After every 10 ally attacks, party's Attack is increased by <color=#fffc40>40%</color> for 1 turn.

name: Trojan Horse
desc: <color=#FF423F>Trojan Horse</color>: <color=#fffc40>Combat Chip</color>. When an ally activates a Resonance, gain <color=#fffc40>5</color> deployment points (only once per action). Allies' Resonance damage is increased by <color=#fffc40>60%</color>.

name: Special Effect
desc:
At the end of each turn, foes gain 1 <color=#FFFC40>Berserk</color> stack.
Berserk: Increase damage by a set amount. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Overload
desc: <color=#FF423F>Overload</color>: <color=#fffc40>Combat Chip</color>. When an ally deals critical damage, gain <color=#fffc40>4</color> deployment points. Allies' critical rate is increased by <color=#fffc40>18%</color>.

name: Bughack-I0
desc: <color=#FF423F>Bughack-I0</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Self-Destruct Bot</color> attacks, 80% chance to grant <color=#fffc40>1</color> random weakness to the target. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Shieldbreak-N1
desc: <color=#FF423F>Shieldbreak-N1</color>: After taking an attack from a <color=#fffc40>Self-Destruct Bot</color>, target's damage taken from an ally with a shield is increased by <color=#fffc40>30%</color>. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Elemental Combat-T0
desc: <color=#FF423F>Elemental Combat-T0</color>: After taking an attack from a <color=#fffc40>Self-Destruct Bot</color>, the target's Fire, Ice, Electric, and Wind damage taken is increased by <color=#fffc40>40%</color> for 2 turns. Only activates once per battle.

name: Elemental Combat-E2
desc: <color=#FF423F>Elemental Combat-E2</color>: After taking an attack from a <color=#fffc40>Self-Destruct Bot</color>, the target's Psychokinesis, Nuclear, Bless, and Curse damage taken is increased by 40% for 2 turns. Only activates once per battle.

name: Electrojammer-R0
desc: <color=#FF423F>Electrojammer-R0</color>: After taking an attack from a <color=#fffc40>Self-Destruct Bot</color>, the target's damage is decreased by <color=#fffc40>25%</color> for 2 turns.

name: Firewall Buster-N3
desc: <color=#FF423F>Firewall Buster-N3</color>: After taking an attack from a <color=#fffc40>Self-Destruct Bot</color>, the target's damage taken is increased by <color=#fffc40>5%</color>. Damage taken is increased by <color=#fffc40>5%</color> more for each debuff the target has, up to <color=#fffc40>30%</color>. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Trojan Replicator-E9
desc: <color=#FF423F>Trojan Replicator-E9</color>: After taking an attack from a <color=#fffc40>Self-Destruct Bot</color>, the target's damage taken is permanently increased by <color=#fffc40>15%</color>. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Volt Regulator-T1
desc: <color=#FF423F>Volt Regulator-T1</color>: After taking an attack from a <color=#fffc40>Self-Destruct Bot</color>, the target's critical resistance is decreased by <color=#fffc40>9%</color> for 2 turns.

name: Voltage Amp-E2
desc: <color=#FF423F>Voltage Amp-E2</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, the party's Attack is increased by <color=#fffc40>20%</color> for 1 turn.

name: Firewall Booster-X3
desc: <color=#FF423F>Firewall Booster-X3</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks,party's Defense is increased by <color=#fffc40>30%</color> for 1 turn.

name: Data Recovery-P1
desc: <color=#FF423F>Data Recovery-P1</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, the party's HP is restored by <color=#fffc40>15%</color>.

name: Memory Expansion-L9
desc: <color=#FF423F>Memory Expansion-L9</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, the party's SP is restored by <color=#fffc40>15%</color>.

name: Charging-O1
desc: <color=#FF423F>Charging-O1</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, 50% chance to fill the Highlight gauge to maximum.

name: Trojan Hack-S8
desc: <color=#FF423F>Trojan Hack-S8</color>: After a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, all allies' attacks have a <color=#fffc40>50%</color> chance to inflict 1 random elemental ailment on the target. Lasts for 1 turn.

name: Data Encryption-I4
desc: <color=#FF423F>Data Encryption-I4</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, the ally with the lowest HP gains a shield equal to <color=#fffc40>80%</color> of their lost HP (250 or more). Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Chip Overclock-O1
desc: <color=#FF423F>Chip Overclock-O1</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, the party's damage is increased by <color=#fffc40>5%</color>. Damage is increased by <color=#fffc40>0.5%</color> more for each 1% of HP lost, up to <color=#fffc40>40%</color>. Lasts for 1 turn.

name: Support Enhancer-N9
desc: <color=#FF423F>Support Enhancer-N9</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, the party's damage is increased by <color=#fffc40>2.5%</color>. Damage is increased by <color=#fffc40>7.5%</color> more for each <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color>. Lasts for 1 turn.

name: Algorithm Booster-F1
desc: <color=#FF423F>Algorithm Booster-F1</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, Elucidator's cooldown time is decreased by <color=#fffc40>1</color> turn.

name: Energy Circuit Amp-F2
desc: <color=#FF423F>Energy Circuit Amp-F2</color>: Each time a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color>'s attack hits a foe, party's damage is increased by <color=#fffc40>8%</color>, up to <color=#fffc40>32%</color>. Lasts for 1 turn.

name: Electromagnetic Pulse-F3
desc: <color=#FF423F>Electromagnetic Pulse-F3</color>: When a <color=#fffc40>Combat Drone</color> attacks, 1 random foe will be Marked. When a Marked foe is attacked, spend Mark to deal a guaranteed critical hit.

name: Special Effect
desc: When Dvesha's Nose is present, all of Dvesha's Mouth's affinities change from Resist to Null.

name: Special Effect
desc: When all of Dvesha's parts are revived, its healing effects are increased.

name: Special Effect
desc: Dvesha's Nose can attack even without twitching.

name: Special Effect
desc: When Dvesha's Eye is defeated, the other parts will be strengthened.

name: Special Effect
desc: Dvesha's Eye can place Watchful Eye on 2 foes at the same time.

name: Special Effect
desc: The revival cooldown time for all of Dvesha's parts is shortened.

name: Special Effect

name: Special Effect

name: Special Effect
desc: At the end of Piggytron's turn, effects gained from Berserk are increased.

name: Special Effect
desc: When preparing, the number of foes targeted by Lock On is increased to 2.

name: Special Effect
desc: Cheerleaders' HP is greatly increased.

name: Special Effect
desc: At the start of the turn, gain 1 stack of Aphrodite's Blessing. Lose 1 stack when taking damage of the same attribute, and gain 1 stack when taking damage of a different attribute. Aphrodite's Blessing: Start with 2 stacks. Decrease damage taken by 15% for each stack. Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: Whenever successfully inflicting Windswept, damage is increased by 15%. Stacks up to 8 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: When a Demon Sword Clone is attacked, Shadow Miyazawa's Attack buffs become permanent.

name: Special Effect
desc: At the start of the action, gain 1 Pan's Protection stack. Lose 1 stack when taking damage of a different attribute, but gain 1 stack when taking damage of the same attribute. Pan's Protection: Start with 2 stacks. Decrease damage taken by 15% for each stack. Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Special Effect
desc: When inflicted with Brainwash, damage dealt changes to normal attack damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: Whenever entering the screen, HP is restored by 15%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Whenever exiting the screen, Attack is permanently increased by 15%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When Moha uses Wing Blast, 1 more foe is inflicted with Mark. Marked foes' damage taken is increased by 25%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Wrath needed for Moha to use Rapid Ascent is decreased to 8.

name: Special Effect
desc: Damage of Moha's Sphinx Dive is greatly increased.

name: Special Effect
desc: Foes' Ballista Energy gain rate is decreased by 50%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Increase the effects Moha gains from Growth and extend Growth each turn.

name: Special Effect
desc: When Avidya uses Work Order, summon 2 more Corporobo MDL-AM and Corporobo MDL-DM.

name: Special Effect
desc: Performance Evaluation selects 1 more ally.

name: Special Effect
desc: Overtime Order selects 1 more ally.

name: Special Effect
desc: When Avidya uses Selfless Devotion, it selects 2 allies at once and greatly increases their self-destruct damage.

name: Special Effect
desc: Corporobo MDL-ED's stats are greatly increased. If Corporobo MDL-ED is present when Corporobo MDL-GM is defeated, 1 more Corporobo MDL-GM is immediately summoned.

desc: The Wraith of Envy continuously summons servants to fight.

name: Special Effect
desc: When the Wraith of Envy activates Lock On, it locks on to 1 more target. The Wraith of Envy's max HP is increased by 80%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When the Wraith of Envy activates Lock On, the target's damage taken is increased by 10%, and the Wraith of Envy's Attack is increased by 10%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When the Wraith of Envy activates Lock On, the target's damage taken is increased by 25%, and the Wraith of Envy's Attack is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When the Wraith of Envy activates Dark Whisper, its damage is increased by 15% and Attack by 10%.

name: Special Effect

desc: When the Wraith of Envy is Weakened, its damage taken is decreased from 100% to 80%, and its max HP is increased by 20%.

name: Special Effect

name: Special Effect
desc: When the Wraith of Envy's Eye is destroyed, its revive turn count is decreased from 3 turns to 2, and its max HP is increased by 40%.

name: Special Effect
desc: When the Wraith of Envy's Eye is destroyed, its revive turn count is decreased from 3 turns to 2, and its max HP is increased by 40%.

name: Special Effect
desc: The shield from Jikokuten's Blade of Sanctuary is increased by 25%, and Jikokuten's max HP is increased by 20%.

desc: Bishamonten's Parasol of Chaos changes allies' affinities to Null. Bishamonten's Attack is increased by 25%.

desc: Horn of Pestilence's max HP down effects are increased by 15%. White Rider's Attack is increased by 10%.

name: Special Effect
desc: The target of Horn of Pestilence changes to all foes. White Rider's max HP is increased by 80%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Horn of Famine increases foes' SP costs by 20% more. Black Rider's Attack is increased by 10%.

name: Special Effect
desc: Horn of Famine increases foes' SP costs by 30% more. Black Rider's Attack is increased by 25%.
